poem:
Title: "In Pursuit of Democracy"

Unshackled turmoil, split seams of pride, 
American silence breaks, on life's heaving tide.
Violence portrayed on a nation's stage,
Yet resolute hearts, in unity engage.
A Phoenix rises, Biden's earnest decree,
Bared on his soul; our democracy's key.
Threat echoes still, but we'll persist for peace,
For our nation's legacy, must never cease.
